de.charite.compbio.jannovar.pedigree

Class PedigreeQueryDecorator

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.charite.compbio.jannovar.pedigree.PedigreeQueryDecorator

  • public class PedigreeQueryDecorator
extends Object
    Decorator of Pedigree that allows for the easy querying.
    Author:
    Manuel Holtgrewe, Peter N Robinson
